lead_paragraph: Sailing past her crumpled teammate, Anna van der Breggen suddenly realized she was the only hope the Netherlands had of defending its gold medal in the women's Olympic road race.

headline.print_headline: Dutch Rider Van Der Breggen Wins Olympic Gold in Road Race
headline.main: Dutch Rider Van Der Breggen Wins Olympic Gold in Road Race

snippet: Sailing past her crumpled teammate, Anna van der Breggen suddenly realized she was the only hope the Netherlands had of defending its gold medal in the women's Olympic road race....
